description:
An alarm suddenly rings throughout Merone Base. Irie learns from Ginger Bread`s report that Tsuna and his friends have snuck in! Irie stands motionless as he stares at the image of Tsuna on the giant monitor. All of the information that he had over looked, including the fact that the monitors had been tampered with, and the details of Dendro Chilum`s battle in the hangar, come pouring in. Irie panics even more and sends Spanner, from Black Spell, after them. Who are the four giant shadows looming behind Spanner`s thin body--?
Source: crunchyroll
